selrach.bnetbuilder.model.variable
Class DiscreteVariable

java.lang.Object
  selrach.bnetbuilder.model.variable.RandomVariable
      selrach.bnetbuilder.model.variable.DiscreteVariable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RandomVariable>
public class DiscreteVariable
extends RandomVariable

A DiscreteVariable is a variable with a limited amount of states that it can be in.

Author:
Charles Robertson
See Also:
